ygData.subject: Re: BACK to wizards...
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed an alarmingly low amount of information about wizards out there (on the net and such). There are several websites dedicated to many of the other
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed an alarmingly low amount of information about wizards out
there (on the net and such). There are several websites dedicated to
many of the other classes from warriors to rogues and druids to
necromancers. We need a place for wizards. Hehe, not that I have the
time or energy to do this, but I have enough to recognize the need!

Any ideas on what to do? Rather than having all the same questions asked
here over and over again we can have a central repository of information
(faq?). Like for instance, strategies at certain levels, where to hunt,
spell combinations, class combinations, etc. Let me know if anyone is
interested maybe we can make something work :)

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
